title: Understanding the Context
text: Nan is trying to predict the number of school-age kids in her district. Consider resources that provide data or trends related to population.

title: Keyword: Statistical Database
text: A statistical database is a collection of data that allows for analysis and patterns to be drawn. It typically contains numerical data used for statistical analysis.

title: Keyword: Research Resource
text: Research resources are diverse types of tools or collections used to gather information. They can include databases, archives, or libraries.

title: Identifying the Right Resource
text: Think about which resource provides large sets of data that can be analyzed to predict future trends.
